scripts.build: yarn use-prod-typings && yarn clean:dist && lerna run build
scripts.build:watch: yarn use-dev-typings && yarn clean:dist && lerna run --parallel build:watch
scripts.clean: yarn clean:dist && rimraf packages/*/coverage packages/*/yarn-error.log yarn-error.log lerna-debug.log
scripts.clean:dist: rimraf packages/*/coverage packages/*/dist packages/*/yarn-error.log yarn-error.log lerna-debug.log
scripts.qa: yarn lint && yarn format:check && yarn test
